about_the_game:
Jan's Token Pack 06 - Heroes 2

This token pack includes 20 heroic characters.
A male dark-elf ranger, and female dark-elf spellcaster for your dark adventures underground!
Demonborn tokens both male and female. Such as the warlock, rogue, and sorcerer. Will they try to hide their demonic ancestry or bravely face the world?
A Roman soldier. The legionary wields his gladius short sword and scutum shield. A version with and without helmet.
An old grey wizard with a beard, wielding his wooden staff. And many more tokens.
May you take them on great adventures!
Converted by:   Jan Loos

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and any ruleset.

A Roman soldier. The legionary wields his gladius short sword and scutum shield. A version with and without helmet.
An old grey wizard with a beard, wielding his wooden staff. And many more tokens.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz processor or higher
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 compatible video adapter
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
